plot: A young man who lost his legs as a young boy maintains a positive outlook on life. Ultimately, does his dream come true?
title: Bird of Paradise
plot_es: A young man who lost his legs as a young boy maintains a positive outlook on life. Ultimately, does his dream come true?
plot_en: A young man who lost his legs as a young boy maintains a positive outlook on life. Ultimately, does his dream come true?
